description: Tasks template for upgrade to latest LTS versions. This file tracks individual upgrade tasks for the modernization plan.

tasks.description: Upgrade to Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to 21, Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, migrate javax.* to jakarta.* namespace if needed, and update dependencies for compatibility with the latest LTS versions
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Java from 17 to 21 and Spring Boot from 3.2.1 to 3.4.1. All builds and tests pass. Spring Framework automatically upgraded to 6.2.1. No javax.* to jakarta.* migration required as project was already on Jakarta EE.
